text: Guy Carawan (July 27, 1927 â€“ May 2, 2015) was an American folk musician and musicologist. He served as music director and song leader for the Highlander Research and Education Center in New Market, Tennessee. He was born in Los Angeles, California. Carawan died in New Market, Tennessee at the age of 87. ==Other websites== *Guy and Candie Carawan Homepage *Highlander Center, official web site *Heatcar Productions, official web site, Heather Carawan *Carawan Discography on Folkways *Profile of Guy Carawan from the Association for Cultural Equity Category:1927 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:Musicians from Tennessee Category:Singers from Tennessee
title: Guy Carawan
